title: I don't care if we get SoloQ.
body:
I don't care if some champions are obnoxiously strong.

I don't care if SoloQ never comes back.

I don't care if I get toxic teammates or of their ilk.

I don't care if I get matched against high tiered premades in normals/ranked.

I don't care if another mage/adc/bruiser/tank or whatever class gets reworked.

I don't care if Riot makes controversial statements,reworks, updates etc.

You know what I do care about? 4v5s basically making any game go from enjoyable to utter despair.  I don't like the fact that if our team or the enemy team loses a teammate because of afking/dcing making this game just not going from a even matchup to basically "lolol ez game guys free win/elo for me!!!"

I mean for fuck's sake its been 6 seasons going into FUCKING 7 that this game YOUR COMPANY RIOT that hasn't at least come up with something to at least fix this. Sad thing is I don't think this problem will ever be fixed.
